title: Baby Carrier
description: large black cotton baby carrier with embroidered, plain, and brocade silk in rose, red, blue, and green floral pattern; embroidered floral pattern in pink, purple, green, and orange; trimmed with narrow embroidered bands with silver braid trim;  blue, green and black applique; small top panel (5\" x 5\") criss-crossed with brown strips forming ties
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
